org.rcsb.mbt.model.attributes
Class ResidueColorByFragmentType

java.lang.Object
  org.rcsb.mbt.model.attributes.ResidueColorByFragmentType
All Implemented Interfaces:
IResidueColor
public class ResidueColorByFragmentType
extends java.lang.Object
implements IResidueColor

This class implements the ResidueColor interface by applying a color to the given Residue by using the secondary structure Fragment type.

Author:
John L. Moreland
See Also:
IResidueColor, Residue
